description: With Kindle for webOS on the HP TouchPad, you can shop the Kindle Store for over 950,000 Kindle books, read thousands of free books, and get free book samples before you decide to buy. Whispersync technology lets you read books from your Kindle Library and saves your last page read, bookmarks, notes and highlights across your devices including your PC. Text size, background color and brightness controls ensure comfortable reading. And with Kindle for webOS, you can organize your local Library into Collections and import Collections from a Kindle device. webOS 3.0.2 is recommended for this update.
